ds_map_is_list: With this function you can check to see if a DS list is stored in the given map key. If the given key contains a DS list ID, then the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
The id of the ds_map to use.

{ANY_CODE} var size = ds_map_size(inventory) ;
var key = ds_map_find_first(inventory);
for (var i = 0; i < size; i++;)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}if ds_map_is_list(inventory, key)
{nbsp_x8}{
{nbsp_x8}ds_list_destroy(key);
{nbsp_x8}}
{nbsp_x4}key = ds_map_find_next(inventory);
{nbsp_x1} {nbsp_x1} }
ds_map_destroy(inventory);

The above code loops through a DS map and checks to see if any of the keys within it are for a DS list. If they are, then the DS list is destroyed, and the at the end of the loop the DS map is destroyed too.
